title: Kansas
prompt: A weathered wooden sign reading "County Hospital" or similar hangs from a post along a quiet Kansas backroad at golden hour, with flat prairie stretching behind it under a pale sky; a pickup truck is parked nearby, slightly out of focus. The photograph captures the solitary, understated presence of rural infrastructure against vast emptinessâ€”shot from a distance that conveys isolation without drama, in the documentary style of rural American decline photography, with warm amber light casting long shadows across gravel and dry grass.
